file_content.text: Halt! You are under arrest. Lay down your weapons.
Better idea. You lie down and die.
Not a chance. [Attack]
You better have a good reason for this.
Why am I under arrest?
Conspiracy to commit an act of terrorism against the Republic.
Hey, I'm just passing through.
Who me? I'm innocent.
Save it. We already know why you're here.
We captured your accomplice, one Tarro Blood, who implicated you when he confessed under Master Jarro's questioning.
You've made a mistake. Let's let the Jedi sort it out.
Let me speak with this Jarro.
So you can attempt your assassination? How stupid do you think I am?
Someone makes baseless accusations and you're just going to take his word for it?
I don't know any "Tarro."
Master Jarro was certain. That's all the reason I need.
I should've figured that scum would crack.
That squealing rat.
You think you'd fare any better against a Jedi Master?
Time to join your friend in the brig. You can plea your case when we ship you to Coruscant to stand trial.
This is your last warning: Drop your weapons and surrender, or we will open fire.
You're going to want to get out of my way.
Just run.
Sorry, I want my blaster handy when I see Tarro.
Afraid I can't do that.
You were warned. Open fire!
Going peacefully ain't my thing.
Not if I open fire first. [Attack]
Open fire!
